title: Check if the customer is active
code:
IF CUSTOMER-STATUS = 'ACTIVE'
   CONTINUE
ELSE
   DISPLAY 'Customer is not active'
END-IF.

title: Calculate the total order amount
code: MULTIPLY ITEM-PRICE BY ITEM-QUANTITY GIVING ORDER-TOTAL.

title: Check if the customer has enough credit
code:
IF CUSTOMER-CREDIT >= ORDER-TOTAL
   CONTINUE
ELSE
   DISPLAY 'Insufficient credit'
END-IF.

title: Apply a 10% discount if the customer is a VIP
code:
IF CUSTOMER-TYPE = 'VIP'
   MULTIPLY ORDER-TOTAL BY 0.9 GIVING ORDER-TOTAL
END-IF.

title: Check if the order is within business hours
code:
IF CURRENT-TIME >= '09:00:00' AND CURRENT-TIME <= '17:00:00'
   CONTINUE
ELSE
   DISPLAY 'Order is outside business hours'
END-IF.

title: Calculate the tax amount
code: MULTIPLY ORDER-TOTAL BY TAX-RATE GIVING TAX-AMOUNT.

title: Add tax to the total order amount
Check if the order quantity is available in stock
code:
IF ITEM-QUANTITY <= STOCK-QUANTITY
   CONTINUE
ELSE
   DISPLAY 'Insufficient stock'
END-IF.

title: Update the stock quantity after an order
Check if the customer is old enough to place an order
code:
IF CUSTOMER-AGE >= 18
   CONTINUE
ELSE
   DISPLAY 'Customer is underage'
END-IF.

title: Check if the order is within the maximum limit
code:
IF ORDER-QUANTITY <= MAX-ORDER-LIMIT
   CONTINUE
ELSE
   DISPLAY 'Order exceeds maximum limit'
END-IF.

title: Apply a 5% discount if the order quantity is more than 10
code:
IF ORDER-QUANTITY > 10
   MULTIPLY ORDER-TOTAL BY 0.95 GIVING ORDER-TOTAL
END-IF.
